titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Accountability

bill.summary: This resolution elects Members to committees of the House of Representatives. Specifically, it names Mr. Suozzi to the Committee on Homeland Security and Ms. Pressley to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability.
